title: EkAnta bhakti tarum sadgurunAthA
sahitya:
EkAnta bhakti tArum sadgurunAthA


anupallavi

  pOghAda iDam tanilE pOghAmal enai taDuttu


caraNam 1    kanjam vellum undan pAdam nenjil vAzha enda pOdum 
anjEl kUri aruLvAyE abhaya karam tandaruLvAyE
    caraNam 2    rAsa kunjam en nanjil vAzha konjiDum rAdhaiyum tOnra 
panjarattin shuvai tanaiyE pADiya mIrAvum tOnra
